mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP ( SHOP_NM, PRICE, DISCOUNT_RATE, STOCK, POINT, DELIVERY_PRICE, PART, CONTENTS_ORDER, INTRO, PURCHASE_REVIEW, ENROLL_DT ) VALUES ( #{shopNm}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{stock}, #{point}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{part}, #{contentsOrder}, #{intro}, #{purchaseReview}, NOW() )
